summary: Hyperscalers are aggressively increasing AI-related capex, with Microsoft guiding for $50 billion in FY2025 (+20%), Google raising 2024 capex to $45 billion, and Meta maintaining high investments in AI infrastructure. GPU rental prices remain stable at $3.19/hr, indicating sustained demand. Industry momentum is further bolstered by rumors of GPT-5 and Gemini 2 model releases.
